page.title: 16Redditch Industry. (Part 1)
page.content: Since the{Industrial Revolution,} Redditch has manufactured products, the most famous being{needles,}springs and fishing tackle. Most of the firms were to be found around the old{town {centre.}However, when Redditch was designated a{New Town,}industry was moved to the new{industrial estates. To provide employment,{new firms}were also attracted to the area. Factory units were built for small companies. One industrial area is Moon's Moat. Here, there are needle, food, shoe and printing companies. One of the largest companies is{Hymatic Engineering Co. {Ltd.}The firm was founded in{1937}and moved to their new premises in{1981 when the factory was specially built for them. The company design and produce{precision equipment}and systems for among others, the Ministry of Defence and British Aerospace.
